## ThirdwebSDK.getDropModule() method

Get an instance of a Drop module

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDropModule(moduleAddress: string): DropErc721Module;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  moduleAddress | string | the address of the deployed module |

<b>Returns:</b>

DropErc721Module

the module
